title: Lord Jesus, When I Think On Thee

v1: Lord Jesus, when I think on Thee,
Of all Thy love and grace,
My spirit longs and fain would see,
v2: And though the wilderness I tread,
v3: Yet in Thy love such depths I see,
Contents itself while, Lord, to Thee
v4: My Lord, my life, my rest, my shield,
My rock, my food, my light,
Each thought of Thee doth constant yield
v5: My Savior, keep my spirit stayed,
Till I, in robes of white arrayed,
